name: Retaliation (itch)
description:
A VR game made during the "RESET" game jam.

In this game you are equipped with advanced energy shields, and your task is to survive a relentless onslaught of bullets, by deflecting them back at the robots trying to shoot you.

It was the first time I've ever worked with VR, so I think the game turned out at least passable, given the lack of experience and the time constraint. I'm sorry for the lack of screenshots, but I don't own a VR set myself, so I'm incapable of showing actual gameplay.

Most of the art provided by Karolina Ciężak, check her out:
Here's her art.
The art style was inspired by NieR: Automata, which both of us enjoyed.
